title: Bushtrak
creator_credit: John Kingsford-Smith, Ampol Petroleum Ltd and Kingcroft Productions
brief_description: Shows the layout of an obstacle track designed to test physical prowess. Obstacles include climbing nets, climbing bars and swinging ropes. Commentary by Paul Ricketts.
